remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类实现接口，因此它必须具有方法。Because the class implements the interface, it must have an method. 但是，因为类表示只读集合，添加到集合的项一个无效的操作。However, because the class represents a read-only collection, adding items to the collection is an invalid operation.
